properties.class: Human Knight, Human Wizard, Palus Knight

steps.text: Talk to Shadow Orim in the Death Pass.
Talk to Armor Merchant Alexandria in the Luxury shop of the Town of Giran.

Collect the gems: Talk to Magister Iker in the Mystic Guild of the Town of Giran. Go to Ivory Tower Crater, hunt Reinforced Stone Golem, collect Reinforced Stone Golem Heartstone  — 20 pcs. Go to the Plains of the Lizardmen, hunt Leto Lizardman, Leto Lizardman Archer, Leto Lizardman Soldier, Leto Lizardman Warrior, Leto Lizardman Shaman, Leto Lizardman Overlord, collect Leto Lizardman Amulet  — 20 pcs. Go to the Sea of Spores, to hunt: Dire Wyrm, until you’ve collected Dire Wyrm Fang  — 20 pcs. Talk to Magister Iker in the Mystic Guild of the Town of Giran. Talk to Magister Kaira in Dark Elf Guild in the in the Town of Gludio. Talk to Grocer Lars in the Magic shop in the Town of Dion.

Go to the Execution Grounds, hunt Quest Monster Nameless Revenant, until you have Aklantoth 1st Gem . Talk to Accessory Merchant Nestle in the Grocery Shop in Gludin Village. Talk to Leopold at the southeastern gate of Gludin Village. Go to the Wasteland, hunt Quest Monster Skeleton Mercenary, collect Aklantoth 1st Gem , Aklantoth 1st Gem , Aklantoth 1st Gem .
Talk to Shadow Orim in the Death Pass, Quest Monster Dre Vanul Prince Zeruel will appear.
Kill Quest Monster Dre Vanul Prince Zeruel, get 1st Brimstone .
Talk to Shadow Orim in the Death Pass.
Collect the items: Talk to Sir Klaus Vasper near Warrior Guild in Gludin Village.
Talk to Priest Vadin in Einhasad Temple in the Town of Oren. Go to Hunters Valley, hunt Tamlin Orc, Tamlin Orc Archer, collect Tamlin Orc Amulet  — 20 pcs.
Talk to Priest Vadin in Einhasad Temple in the Town of Oren. Talk to Sir Klaus Vasper near Warrior Guild in Gludin Village. Talk to Magister Iker in the Mystic Guild of the Town of Giran.
Talk to Shadow Orim in the Death Pass.
Talk to Fisher Evert near Floran Village. Quest Monster Dre Vanul Prince Zeruel will appear.
Kill Quest Monster Dre Vanul Prince Zeruel using the Sword of Seal, get Purgatory Key , Zeruel Bind Crystal .
Talk to Shadow Orim in the Death Pass and get the reward.
